page.title: 14PARTRIDGE HILL FARM (2)
page.content: Buildings, Machinery and Animals ________________________________ The Farm buildings include a house, two workers{cottages}only one of which is occupied plus 8 other out buildings including{barns,}an unused{dairy, {stables}and a{pig sty.}The house has been added to over the years but the bulk of it dates back to around the 18th century. The building has no special features but the oringinal {partile roof}has recently been replaced because of storm damage. Farm machinery includes,a com drill,5 tractors,1 combine harvester,1 cropsprayer,2 ploughs and various cultivater equipment. The only animals are{65 chickens}but between November and March they look after 300 sheep and 60 cows for another farmer in North Yorkshire.
